view.web

Class SearchQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.web.SearchQuery

  • public class SearchQuery
extends Object
    This class provides an abstraction of a SearchQuery, which has the attribute of an address which is the address to request the Gson file from the Google API, including a "count" which is for what set of results the user wants to show.
    Author:
    Jaln Rodger, Daniel van Wichen
